attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2012-1389

Date: 2012-10-22

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Greg Stewart, President, Farm Credit Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($290,700 - $341,900), effective April 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 31(1) of the Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of John K. Lynn, Chief Executive Officer, Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 3 ($175,600 - $206,500), effective April 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Michèle Bourque, President and Chief Executive Officer, Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($251,800 - $296,200), effective April 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 3.1(2) of the Canadian Commercial Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Whittingham, President, Canadian Commercial Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 4 ($210,600 - $247,700), effective April 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of R. Anthony McGuinness, Chief Executive Officer, Atlantic Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($146,400 - $172,200), effective January 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 21 (2) of the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority Act, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin McGarr, former Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Air Transport Security Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 4 ($207,400 - $244,000), effective December 31, 2011.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108 (1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Robert Fernand Lemire, Chief Executive Officer, Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($146,400 - $172,200), effective January 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Réjean Lanteigne, Chief Executive Officer, Laurentian Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($146,400 - $172,200), effective January 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Wayne M. Follett, former President and Chief Executive Officer, Marine Atlantic Inc., as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 3 ($172,900 - $203,400), effective December 9, 2011.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108 (1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin G. Obermeyer, Chief Executive Officer, Pacific Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($146,400 - $172,200), effective January 1, 2012.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Laliberté, President and Chief Executive Officer, VIA Rail Canada Inc., as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 5 ($252,700 - $297,200), effective January 1, 2012.
